name: Alternate Hammer Curl
instructions: Stand upright holding dumbbells at arm's length.
Curl the right weight forward to shoulder level while contracting your biceps.
Slowly return to start and repeat with the left arm.
Alternate arms for the recommended repetitions.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Lie on an incline bench with dumbbells held at shoulder width.
Press the dumbbells upward until arms are extended.
Lower the dumbbells back to shoulder level.
Repeat for the recommended repetitions.

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Sit on the lat pulldown machine and grab the bar with a wide grip.
Pull the bar to your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades.
Slowly return to the start.
Repeat for the recommended repetitions.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit on the leg press machine and place feet shoulder-width apart.
Push the platform upward, avoiding knee lock.
Lower the platform back slowly.
Repeat for the recommended repetitions.

name: Bench Press
instructions: Lie flat on a bench with a barbell over your chest.
Grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder-width and lift it.
Lower it to your chest and push back up.
Repeat for the recommended repetitions.

name: Barbell Deadlift
instructions: Stand shoulder-width apart with a barbell in front.
Bend at hips and knees to grab the bar.
Lift the bar by extending your hips and knees.
Lower the bar with control and repeat.

name: Dumbbell Lunges
instructions: Hold dumbbells and step forward with one leg.
Lower your body until the front thigh is parallel to the floor.
Push through your front foot to return.
Alternate legs for the recommended repetitions.

name: Overhead Dumbbell Press
instructions: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height with palms forward.
Press the dumbbells upward until arms are extended.
Lower back to start.
Repeat for the recommended repetitions.

name: Seated Leg Press
instructions: Sit on the leg press machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Press the platform forward until your legs are extended.
Lower it back slowly to the start.
Repeat for the recommended repetitions.

name: Chest Press
instructions: Sit on the chest press machine with handles at chest level.
Push the handles forward until arms are extended.
Return to the start slowly.
Repeat for the recommended repetitions.

name: Push-Up
instructions: Start in a plank position with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Lower your chest towards the floor, keeping elbows close to your body.
Push back up to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended repetitions.

name: Plank
instructions: Start in a plank position with your forearms on the ground and elbows under your shoulders.
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Hold the position for the recommended duration.

name: Kettlebell Swing
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding the kettlebell with both hands.
Hinge at the hips to swing the kettlebell between your legs.
Drive through your hips to swing it up to shoulder height.
Let the kettlebell swing back down and repeat.

name: Pull-Up
instructions: Grab the pull-up bar with palms facing away and arms shoulder-width apart.
Pull your body upward until your chin clears the bar.
Lower yourself back down with control.
Repeat for the recommended repetitions.

name: Goblet Squat
instructions: Hold a dumbbell vertically at chest level with both hands.
Lower into a squat, keeping your chest up and knees tracking over your toes.
Push through your heels to stand back up.
Repeat for the recommended repetitions.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell in front of your thighs.
Hinge at your hips to lower the barbell down your legs.
Keep your back straight and shoulders back.
Return to standing and repeat.

name: Overhead Press
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell at shoulder height.
Press the barbell overhead until arms are fully extended.
Lower it back to shoulder height and repeat.

name: Bent-Over Dumbbell Row
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand and hinge at your hips, keeping your back flat.
Pull the dumbbells toward your waist, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Lower them back down and repeat.

name: Tricep Dip
instructions: Grip the parallel bars and lift yourself up.
Lower your body by bending your elbows until they reach a 90-degree angle.
Push back up to the starting position.
Repeat for the recommended repetitions.
